translation.en: I'm calm, steady.
I slept well. 8.2 hours. No bad dreams.
translation.fr: J'ai bien dormi, 8.2 heures. Pas de cauchemars.

translation.en: I am ready to go.
Ready to do my job to the best of my abilities.
translation.fr: prêt à faire mon travail de mon mieux.

translation.en: I am focused only on the essential, to the exclusion of all else.
translation.fr: Je suis concentré sur l'essentiel, j'exclus tout le reste.

translation.en: I will make only pragmatic decisions.
I will not allow myself to be distracted.
translation.fr: Je ne me laisserai pas distraire.

translation.en: I will not allow my mind to linger on that which is unimportant.
translation.fr: Je ne laisserai pas mon esprit s'attarder sur ce qui est accessoire.

translation.en: I will not rely on anyone or anything.
translation.fr: Je ne compterai sur rien ni personne.

translation.en: I will not be vulnerable to mistakes.
translation.fr: Je ne tomberai pas dans l'erreur.

translation.en: Resting BPM, 47. Submit.
Your psychological evaluation has been approved.
As a reminder,
translation.fr: Rappel : effectuez les tests de sécurité...

translation.en: please perform any safety and equipment checks...
translation.fr: Rappel : effectuez les tests de sécurité... J'ai toujours voulu être astronaute.

translation.en: I always wanted to become an astronaut...
for the future of mankind and all.
translation.fr: Pour l'avenir de l'humanité et tout.

translation.en: At least, that's what I always told myself.
translation.fr: En tout cas, c'est ce que je me suis toujours dit.

translation.en: I see myself from the outside.
translation.fr: Je me vois avec un regard extérieur.

translation.en: Smile, present a side.
It's a performance...
with my eye on the exit.
translation.fr: Les yeux tournés vers la sortie.

translation.en: Always on the exit.
Just don't touch me.
translation.fr: Mais qu'on ne me touche pas.

translation.en: Take care, Major. Be careful.
Thanks for that.
Roy, Bravo post has got a robotic arm on 93 Echo...
translation.fr: Roy, un bras robot du Pylône B en 93 E

We're gonna need you to take a team down there and check it out. Run some diagnostics. Over.
translation.fr: Il faudrait qu'une équipe vérifie et lance des diagnostics.

translation.en: Copy that. Heading that way.
Good morning to our astronauts up there on the International Space Antenna.
translation.fr: Bonjour à nos astronautes sur l'Antenne Spatiale Internationale.

translation.en: Sure is a beautiful day.
Just perfect to try and contact...
our distant neighbors out there in the heavens.
At least it's comfortable out here.
translation.fr: Au moins, je suis à l'aise, ici.

translation.en: I got some scores here.
translation.fr: Au moins, je suis à l'aise, ici. J'ai des résultats de football. Iowa State contre Kansas :

translation.fr: J'ai des résultats de football. Iowa State contre Kansas : 35 à 16.

translation.en: Space I understand.

translation.en: Affirmative, Major. Proceed.
Copy that. Moving to the unit now.

translation.en: Control, we got a lot of people up there. Over.

translation.en: Control. Control, I think we have some spikes...
Please just stand by, we're working the issue.
Just stand by.  Control, they're happening everywhere.
translation.fr: Contrôle, il y en a de partout !

translation.en: Command, cutting power.
Get off the tower now!
You've gotta bail out!
Control, McBride.
I'm in a spin.
Atmosphere's too thin to stabilize.
I'm trying to keep the tumble down,
so I don't black out.
Control, do you read?
A self- destructive side.
That's what she used to say to me.
I should feel something.
I survived. I should feel something.
translation.fr: J'ai survécu. Ça devrait me toucher.

translation.en: In what has become known as The Surge...
translation.fr: Ça devrait me toucher. Lors de la Surcharge, des orages électriques ont semé

translation.en: a series of destructive electrical storms
translation.fr: Lors de la Surcharge, des orages électriques ont semé

translation.en: has wreaked havoc across the globe...
translation.fr: Lors de la Surcharge, des orages électriques ont semé le chaos dans le monde.

translation.en: and scientists are concerned we've not seen the last of them yet.
translation.fr: Les scientifiques craignent qu'il s'en produise d'autres.

translation.en: Their origin? Outer space.
- The cause? Unknown so far... -
translation.fr: Leur cause ? Inconnue à ce jour.

translation.en: This is a message from SPACECOM. In light of the recent catastrophe...
translation.fr: Message de SpaceCom. Suite à la récente catastrophe,

translation.en: your attendance is required for a debrief... to be held in Building 91, Vandersteen Base.
translation.fr: vous êtes convoqué à un débriefing, bâtiment 91, base Vandersteen.

translation.en: Please note, this meeting will be classified top secret.
Roy, how are you? Thanks for coming in. Appreciate it.
General.
This is Lieutenant General Rivas, Director of - U.S. SPACECOM Special Ops. - Hi.
translation.fr: Voici le général Rivas, Forces Spéciales de SpaceCom.

translation.en: - Sir. - Major.  Adjutant General Vogel, head of Security. - Major. - Ma'am.
They flew all the way in from Virginia just last night, just to see you.
translation.fr: Ils sont venus exprès de Virginie pour vous voir.

translation.en: Well, thank you.
Your, uh, profile is certainly very impressive.
You've done exceptionally well on all the assessment tests.
translation.fr: Vous avez brillamment passé tous les tests.

translation.en: Basic combat, space training.
Just exceptional across the board.
The rumor is that your pulse rate has never gone above 80...
translation.fr: Est-il vrai que votre pouls n'a jamais dépassé 80

translation.en: in any of the spacewalks, skywalks, and even on this most recent fall. Is that correct?
translation.fr: lors de vos sorties ou même durant cette chute ?

translation.en: Well, so far, sir.
That's very impressive.
According to this, married once, no children?
Yes, sir.
It's dangerous business, as we know.
Best not to subject others to it.
Fair enough.
Well, we didn't bring you in here to talk about your fall, Roy.
translation.fr: On ne vous a pas appelé pour parler de votre chute.

translation.en: We have something...
of a highly classified nature to show you.
translation.fr: de hautement... confidentiel à vous montrer.

translation.en: Please have a seat, Major.
What you are about to see are spectrogram images of Neptune.
translation.fr: Vous allez voir des spectrogrammes de Neptune.

translation.en: These are cosmic ray bursts.
That was taken just 11 days ago.
It released high- energy particles... that caused a catastrophic power surge
translation.fr: Les particules à haute énergie ont causé une terrible surtension

translation.en: all over the world.
And that's what almost killed you.
translation.fr: C'est ce qui a failli vous tuer.

translation.en: The rays grow stronger as they radiate towards us here on Earth.
translation.fr: Les rayons gagnent en puissance à l'approche de la Terre.

translation.en: Major, what can you tell us about the Lima Project?
translation.fr: Que pouvez-vous nous dire du Projet Lima ?

translation.en: First manned expedition to the outer solar system, sir.
translation.fr: Première expédition aux confins du système solaire.

translation.en: Some 29 years ago, as you know.
translation.fr: Il y a environ 29 ans, comme vous le savez.

translation.en: And the commander was...
He was my father, sir.
The ship disappeared approximately 16 years into the mission.
translation.fr: Le vaisseau a disparu au bout de 16 ans environ.

translation.en: No data was ever recovered.
translation.fr: On n'a jamais reçu de données.

translation.en: Deep space missions were halted after that.
translation.fr: Les missions lointaines ont cessé après ça.

translation.en: Yes, that's him.
Can you tell us how you handled your father's absence?
translation.fr: Comment avez-vous vécu l'absence de votre père ?

translation.en: My mother was certainly distressed by it. Uh, she was quite ill at the time.
translation.fr: Ma mère a été très affectée. Elle était malade à l'époque.

translation.en: But he was, uh, committed to his job...
translation.fr: Mais il était... dévoué à son travail,

translation.en: and I'm sure it was very difficult for him as well.
translation.fr: c'était sûrement dur pour lui aussi.

translation.en: Roy...
we have something that might come as quite a shock to you.
translation.fr: on a quelque chose à vous dire qui va vous faire un choc.

translation.en: We believe your father is still alive near Neptune.
translation.fr: On pense que votre père est en vie, près de Neptune.

translation.en: Where exactly, we do not know.
Now, we've sent out numerous drones, but obviously, it's a vast area to cover.
translation.fr: On a envoyé de nombreux drones, mais la zone est immense.

translation.en: My father's alive, sir?
We believe so.
Roy, The Surge seems to be the result of some kind of anti- matter reaction.
translation.fr: La Surcharge semble être due à une réaction d'antimatière.

translation.en: Now, the Lima Project was powered by that material...
translation.fr: C'était la source d'énergie du Projet Lima

translation.en: and your father was in charge of it.
translation.fr: et c'est votre père qui s'en occupait.

translation.en: Now, we're talking about a potentially unstoppable chain reaction here.
translation.fr: On risque de ne pas pouvoir arrêter cette réaction en chaîne.

translation.en: The uncontrolled release of anti- matter...
could ultimately threaten the stability of our entire solar system.
translation.fr: pourrait finir par déstabiliser tout notre système solaire.

translation.en: All life could be destroyed.
Major, we would like you to send
a personal message on Mars by secure laser...
translation.fr: d'envoyer un message personnel depuis Mars par laser sécurisé

translation.en: to what we hope is the Lima Project.
translation.fr: vers ce que nous espérons être le Projet Lima.

translation.en: The text of your message would be prepared in advance, of course.
translation.fr: Votre message serait rédigé d'avance, bien sûr.

translation.en: Mars, sir? I'm going to Mars?
It is the last secure hub we have.
Roy, we need to find out just what we're up against here.
translation.fr: Roy, on doit identifier la menace.

translation.en: Our underground Mars base was the only one unaffected by The Surge.
translation.fr: Notre base souterraine sur Mars est la seule épargnée par la Surcharge.

translation.en: And we believe a personal plea, from you to your father, might elicit a response.
translation.fr: Si vous en appelez à votre père, cela pourrait l'inciter à répondre.

translation.en: We can track that signal...
locate him and figure out a way to stop this.
translation.fr: on pourra le localiser et voir comment faire cesser ça.

translation.en: What is happening out there is a crisis of unknown magnitude.
translation.fr: Il se passe là-haut une crise d'une ampleur inédite.

translation.en: Now, we're counting on you to help us find him.
translation.fr: Nous comptons sur vous pour nous aider à le trouver.

translation.en: Are you with us?
- Yes, I am, sir. - Good.
You deploy first to the moon.
Our long- range rockets are stationed there on the Far Side.
translation.fr: Nos fusées sont basées sur la Face Cachée.

translation.en: Everything after that will be on a need- to- know basis. Yes, sir.
Given the magnitude of the threat...
a cover story is being formulated to avoid all panic.
translation.fr: un scénario officiel sera préparé pour éviter toute panique.

translation.en: You'll be traveling commercially to the moon to keep a low profile.
translation.fr: Vous prendrez un vol commercial pour plus de discrétion.

translation.en: Colonel Pruitt will be your point person from here on.
translation.fr: Le colonel Pruitt sera votre référent.

translation.en: Absolute top secrecy must be maintained.
translation.fr: Le secret total est de rigueur.

translation.en: Are you with us?
Like I have a choice.
My dad was a pioneer.
He sacrificed himself for the search for intelligent life.
translation.fr: Il s'est sacrifié à la recherche de vies intelligentes.

translation.en: My dad was the program.
I was 16 when he left, 29 when he disappeared.
translation.fr: J'avais 16 ans à son départ, 29 ans à sa disparition.

translation.en: Archived message, received 27 years...
translation.fr: Message archivé reçu il y a 27 ans...

translation.en: - 3 months, 2 days ago. - And that's that.
Roy, this is a message from your father.
translation.fr: Roy, c'est un message de ton père.

translation.en: I'm coming at you from the Lima Project.
translation.fr: Je t'appelle depuis le Projet Lima.

translation.en: Just on our way past Jupiter and ultimately on to Neptune.
translation.fr: On passe Jupiter, pour enfin atteindre Neptune.

translation.en: I know you have seen
translation.fr: Je suis sûr que tu as vu que nous avons suscité

translation.fr: Je suis sûr que tu as vu que nous avons suscité un vif intérêt dans le monde

translation.en: around the world, and we are grateful for it.

translation.en: We're doing big things up here, real big.

translation.en: Namely, we're about to answer the number one question...
translation.fr: On répondra bientôt à la grande question :

translation.en: And we know we will.
We're going to the edge of the heliosphere...
where the sun's magnetic field won't affect our instruments one bit.
translation.fr: le champ magnétique du soleil n'affectera pas nos instruments.

translation.en: We'll be able to examine any star system for complex life.
translation.fr: On scrutera les systèmes stellaires à la recherche de vies complexes.

translation.en: Never been done before, and we sure are optimistic.
translation.fr: Ce sera une première et on est optimistes.

translation.en: I feel your energy back home, and of course, I think of God.
translation.fr: Je sens votre énergie à tous et, bien sûr, je pense à Dieu.

translation.en: I'm overwhelmed at seeing and feeling His presence...

translation.en: so close.
I love you, my son.
Hello, Roy.
I'm here to go on this trip with you.
Keep my eye on ya.
Colonel Pruitt, good to meet you.
Actually...
we've met.
It was a long time ago. I knew your dad.

translation.en: We were close, he and I.
translation.fr: On était très liés, lui et moi.

translation.en: We started out together, went to Purdue together.
translation.fr: On a débuté ensemble, à l'Université Purdue.

translation.en: He was a brilliant man.
- I know. - Yeah.
And I remember going to the house and seeing you. You were running around everywhere.
translation.fr: Je lui ai rendu visite et je t'ai vu. Tu courais partout.

translation.en: You drove your poor mother nuts, but...
translation.fr: Ça rendait ta mère folle, mais...

translation.en: How do you feel?
Is this part of my psych eval?

translation.en: No, not really, but yes.
I mean, you're going to be monitored constantly...
translation.fr: Pas vraiment, mais oui. Tu seras suivi de près.

translation.en: your mental state, your emotional state.
translation.fr: Tu seras suivi de près. Ton état mental, émotionnel.

translation.en: You have a direct connection with the subject.
translation.fr: Tu as un lien direct avec le sujet.

translation.en: Colonel, for what it's worth, I think my father's dead.

translation.en: I was a lunar astronaut for SPACECOM for 31 years.
translation.fr: J'ai travaillé comme astronaute lunaire pour SpaceCom pendant 31 ans.

translation.en: And I came to the realization out there...
translation.fr: Et j'ai fini par me rendre compte

translation.en: a voyage of exploration can be used
translation.fr: qu'un voyage d'exploration peut être utilisé simplement comme moyen d'évasion.

translation.en: for something as simple as escape.
translation.fr: peut être utilisé simplement comme moyen d'évasion.

translation.en: I'm telling you this, Roy,
because we have to hold out the possibility...

translation.en: Do you think you're ready to go?
I'm ready.
All right.
Your pre- launch quarantine is almost complete.
You have shown no evidence of bacterial or viral infection...
So many times in my life, I've screwed up.
translation.fr: Dans ma vie, j'ai fait tellement de conneries.

translation.en: Although all efforts have been made...  I've talked, when I should have listened.
translation.fr: J'ai parlé, alors que j'aurais dû écouter.

translation.en: I've been harsh, when I should have been tender.
translation.fr: J'ai été dur, alors que j'aurais dû être tendre.

translation.en: In the event of illness or accident...
translation.fr: En cas de maladie ou d'accident,

translation.en: please make certain that you have listed any family members...
translation.fr: n'oubliez pas de désigner un parent,

translation.en: spouse, or significant other as your next of kin, in your personal file.
translation.fr: une épouse ou un conjoint comme personne de confiance.

translation.en: Volume down.
Message. Personal directory. Eve.
Hi, Eve, it's Roy.
I'm away again, no surprise there.
translation.fr: Je pars à nouveau, sans surprise.

translation.en: I just wanted to say...
I made a promise to always be truthful.
But I wasn't.
Listen, I wanted to say...
I didn't want you to go.
translation.fr: Je voulais pas que tu partes.

translation.en: Delete.
Cancel.
Good morning.
I've been trained to compartmentalize.
SPACECOM requires you to complete a pre- launch psychological evaluation.
translation.fr: SpaceCom exige que vous effectuiez une évaluation psychologique.

translation.en: It seems to me that's how I approach my life.
translation.fr: Je crois que c'est ma règle de vie.

translation.en: Resting BPM is 56.
Didn't sleep much last night, but it shouldn't be a problem.
translation.fr: J'ai peu dormi cette nuit, mais peu importe.

translation.en: I remain mission ready.
You have been approved for lunar travel.
translation.fr: Vous êtes apte à partir pour la Lune.

translation.en: Is it your first time to the moon?
No, but it's been a while.
Are you planning on traveling outside the secure zone on your visit?
translation.fr: Comptez-vous sortir de la zone sécurisée ?

translation.en: - How's that? - Okay.
- Okay, not too snug? - Yeah, it feels all right.
Breathe.
Virgin flight 6092,
translation.fr: Vol Virgin 6092 pour la base lunaire Tycho,

translation.en: to Tycho Base, Moon, boarding now.
translation.fr: Vol Virgin 6092 pour la base lunaire Tycho, embarquement immédiat.

translation.en: Welcome aboard, sir. - I'm Captain Lu. - Thank you.
- Hi, Captain. - Watch the step. - Duck your head. - Okay.
translation.fr: Attention à la marche. Baissez la tête.

translation.en: - Yes, thanks. - Great.
- Third seat, to your right. - Okay.
We remind you, the moon is borderless.
translation.fr: Rappelez-vous que la Lune est sans frontière.

translation.en: Many mining zones are disputed territory and considered to be in a state of war.
translation.fr: Nombre de zones minières sont litigieuses et réputées en guerre.

translation.en: Please stay within the restricted, safe area...
Excuse me? May I have a blanket and pillow pack please?
translation.fr: Excusez-moi. Je peux avoir le pack oreiller-couverture ?

translation.en: Sure. $125.
Payment accepted.
As we approach,
some of you can see the grand telescope array...
translation.fr: Durant l'approche, certains peuvent voir l'observatoire près du cratère Atlas.

translation.en: near the Atlas crater.
It's the moon's largest facility
for extraterrestrial research.
Hot towel?
- Oh, thank you. - Thank you for flying with us. We do appreciate it.
Please prepare for landing.
All the hopes we ever had for space travel...
translation.fr: Tous nos espoirs pour le voyage spatial

translation.en: covered up by drink stands and T- shirt vendors.
translation.fr: noyés sous les buvettes et les stands de T-shirts.

translation.en: Just a recreation of what we're running from on Earth.
translation.fr: Une réplique de ce que l'on fuit sur Terre.

translation.en: We are world- eaters.
translation.fr: On est des dévoreurs de mondes.

translation.en: If my dad could see this now...
he'd tear it all down.
Our rocket is named Cepheus.
The crew will be SPACECOM military personnel.
translation.fr: Pilotée par des militaires de SpaceCom.

translation.en: They're completely unaware of our mission.
translation.fr: Ils ignorent tout de notre mission.

translation.en: We have to keep it that way.
The launchpad is on the other side of no man's land.
translation.fr: Le pas de tir est au-delà du no man's land.

translation.en: It's very dangerous...
so we'll have armed personnel
translation.fr: alors on aura une escorte armée

translation.en: to protect us and escort us to the Far Side.
translation.fr: pour nous protéger jusqu'à la Face Cachée.

translation.fr: de votre dernière conversation avec mon père ?

translation.en: It was not very pleasant.
We quarreled about my leaving the program.
translation.fr: Il m'a reproché d'avoir quitté le programme.

translation.en: He accused me of being a traitor.
And if you were to find him...
then what?
Is this very difficult for you, son?
translation.fr: C'est très dur pour toi, mon petit ?

translation.en: This being about your father?
No, my dad's a hero.

translation.fr: SpaceCom veut dénigrer un homme qui a consacré sa vie au programme.

translation.en: I think it's despicable.
Or desperate at best.
translation.fr: Ou signe de panique, au mieux.

translation.en: We are approaching Terminal R, lunar rover hangar.
translation.fr: Nous arrivons au terminal R, hangar des rovers lunaires.

translation.en: We've been having trouble with pirates since September.
translation.fr: On se coltine des pirates depuis septembre.

It's like the Wild West out there...
but we'll get you to your spacecraft.
translation.fr: Mais on vous conduira au vaisseau.

translation.en: This your first time in a war zone?

translation.en: Three years over the Arctic Circle.
translation.fr: Trois ans au-dessus du cercle arctique.

translation.en: All right.
And a heck of a lot of Army- Navy games.
Well, I guess there's not much you haven't seen, right?
translation.fr: Alors, vous êtes paré pour tout.

translation.en: Well, look, it's almost a full moon.
A large stretch of the Far Side's real black, so let's suit up.

translation.en: Lunar Rovers, Group C,
set for departure...

translation.en: Please maintain situational awareness.
Rover 7, confirming settings.
Bearing two- niner- oh.
Roy?
Yes, Colonel.

Never ceases to amaze me.

Yeah, same here.
I can't ID any national markings. Over.
Alpha, what do we got here?
Alpha, we have what looks like unidentified rovers approaching our position.
translation.fr: On dirait que des rovers non-identifiés s'approchent de nous.

translation.en: Possible pirate activity, and I got a couple of VIPs with me.

Uh, Alpha, we may need some ballistics help up here.

We got two coming up on our rear, 7 o'clock.
Appears to be pirates, possibly looking for valuables.
translation.fr: Sans doute des pirates en quête d'un butin.

translation.en: We'll send ballistic support ASAP.
What the hell am I doing here?
Shit!
Alpha, we need backup ASAP! We're being ambushed!
- Mayday, mayday, mayday! - Give me a weapon!
Just hold on!
LRV- 3 down.
LRV- 2 down.
Alpha, we're gonna go off path to reach the Far Side.

translation.en: I have a puncture!
- Roy! - I have a puncture.
Roy, you all right?
I'm okay.
Alpha, repeat, we need...
Lieutenant! Oh, Lord!
Hey, break it up.

Roy! They're trying to ram us!

Sorry for the loss.
Over.

translation.en: We suggest you get that checked out immediately.

translation.fr: Sa présence est censée me rassurer.

translation.en: I'm fine.
Why does he still do it?
Why can't he just let go?
My dad couldn't either.
translation.fr: Mon père n'y arrivait pas non plus.

translation.en: Major, we've been expecting you.
If you have any personal business you need to tend to, I suggest doing it now.
translation.fr: Si vous avez des affaires privées à régler, allez-y.

translation.en: Your rocket will leave momentarily.
Stand down, Sergeant.
Roy, just let me sit down.
- - Colonel, what is it?
I'm not going to be able to go with you to Mars.
translation.fr: Je ne pourrai pas t'accompagner sur Mars.

translation.en: But there are things you need to know, Roy.
translation.fr: Mais il y a des choses que tu dois savoir.

translation.en: Every minute counts.
Cepheus crew, prepare for pre- launch checks.
SPACECOM communicated with me.
It is classified.
Take it.
It will put you at great risk.
translation.fr: Ça va te mettre en grand danger.

translation.en: They do not trust you on SPACECOM.

translation.en: But it is crucial...
Sergeant!
Commencing pre- launch checks.
You have to go, Roy. Go.

translation.en: Captain, Major McBride, com check.
Loud and clear, sir. Welcome aboard the Cepheus.
translation.fr: Cinq sur cinq. Bienvenue à bord du Cepheus.

translation.en: I'll be hitching a ride with you if that's all right.
Yes, we were alerted, sir.
On our way to Mars, the very last stop.
translation.fr: En route pour Mars, le terminus.

It'll just be one, I'm afraid.
Well, we still like you, Major... McBride!
translation.fr: On vous aime quand même, major... McBride !

translation.en: I think we might just have ourselves
translation.fr: On a le fils d'un héros

translation.en: the son of a legend onboard with us, team.
translation.fr: On a le fils d'un héros à bord, les gars.

translation.en: Roy, son of Clifford McBride.
translation.fr: Roy, le fils de Clifford McBride.

translation.en: How 'bout that? Best in the galaxy.
translation.fr: Ça alors ! Le meilleur de la galaxie.

translation.en: Welcome aboard, sir.
They are scientists and technicians...
long haulers.
Captain, could you contact Control, and ask about the condition of a Colonel Pruitt?
translation.fr: Commandant, pourriez-vous prendre des nouvelles du colonel Pruitt ?

translation.en: Sure, will do now, sir.
SPACECOM, could we get a status...
They seem at ease with themselves.
What must that be like?
Major, the Colonel was taken for emergency surgery.
translation.fr: Major ? Le colonel va être opéré d'urgence.

translation.en: - Copy. - Check list complete.
They're oblivious to my purpose.
The last manned outpost in our solar system.
translation.fr: Dernière colonie de notre système solaire.

translation.en: Duration 19 days, 14 hours and 33 minutes. Over.
Dear Saint Christopher, protect me today
translation.fr: Saint Christophe, sois mon gardien quand je vais par les chemins.

translation.en: in all my travels along the road's way.
translation.fr: sois mon gardien quand je vais par les chemins.

translation.en: Give me your warning sign if danger is near.
translation.fr: Envoie-moi un signe si le danger guette,

translation.en: So that I may stop...
Perfect, cue the minibar.
Command, we're gonna give out the mood stabilizers now.
- Our psych evals to follow. - Frank.
translation.fr: En prévision des éval psy. Frank.

translation.en: 'Cause Lord knows SPACECOM wouldn't want you...
translation.fr: Parce que SpaceCom n'a aucune envie que Yoshida refasse une déprime intersidérale !

translation.en: getting all emotional on us up here, again.
translation.fr: n'a aucune envie que Yoshida refasse une déprime intersidérale !

translation.en: Major?
Get me one of those, candy man.
Captain.
Captain, I have a small oxygen leak in my suit. I'm just gonna check my patch.
translation.fr: Ma combinaison fuit un peu. Je dois recoller ma rustine.

translation.en: Have fun back there.
We'll let you know if we spot any ETs.
translation.fr: On vous dira si on voit un alien.

translation.en: - - Hello, SPACECOM.
We're out here, Cepheus responding. Smooth sailing.
translation.fr: Le Cepheus au rendez-vous. Traversée sans accroc.

translation.en: Roger, Cepheus, we have your telemetry.
translation.fr: Bien reçu. On a votre télémétrie.

translation.en: This is an urgent update
for Colonel Pruitt, Thomas F...
translation.fr: destinées au colonel Pruitt, Thomas F.

translation.en: regarding the status of the Lima Project.
SPACECOM believes it has detected
translation.fr: SpaceCom pense avoir détecté un SOS

translation.en: a possible SOS signal...
from the crew of the Lima Project.
The message could indicate
that Commander H. Clifford McBride...
translation.fr: que le commandant H. Clifford McBride

translation.en: intentionally disabled all external communications.
translation.fr: a volontairement désactivé les communications externes.

translation.en: Under such circumstances...
the Commander may have lost all control.
translation.fr: que le commandant ait perdu tout contrôle.

translation.en: If this is the case...
and communication cannot be made
translation.fr: si le contact n'est pas rétabli

translation.en: through his son on Mars...
translation.fr: si le contact n'est pas rétabli par son fils depuis Mars,

translation.en: then all other efforts must be undertaken
to destroy the Commander...
and halt the surges.
This message is top secret.
What happened to my dad?
What did he find out there?
Did it break him?
Or was he always broken?
My father...
the most decorated astronaut in the history of the program.
translation.fr: l'astronaute le plus décoré de l'histoire du programme.

translation.en: U.S. Air Force Academy...
his doctorate at MIT.
He promised me that one day I could join him in his pursuits...
translation.fr: Il m'avait promis que je partagerais sa quête.

translation.en: that he'd come back for me.
And I believed him.
First man to Jupiter.
First to Saturn.
And then... nothing.
Commence slow down, booster three.
We're slowing down.
Yes, sir.
Got a mayday from another craft, sir.
translation.fr: On a reçu un Mayday d'un autre engin.

translation.en: Captain, this is a classified mission, we cannot stop. Our destination is Mars. Ersa Station.
translation.fr: C'est une mission secrète, pas d'arrêt. On va sur Mars, Station Ersa.

translation.en: Major, this is a mayday. Stopping is protocol.
Any supply craft can answer that call.
The mission is the priority, Captain. Do you not hear what I'm saying?
translation.fr: La mission est prioritaire, vous m'entendez ?

translation.en: Major, with respect, as I say, we are obligated to stop.
translation.fr: Sauf votre respect, je le répète, nous devons nous arrêter.

translation.en: As you're merely a passenger, I'm not sure I comprehend your position.
translation.fr: Vous n'êtes qu'un passager, je comprends mal votre position.

translation.en: 'Course, you are well within your rights to take command of this craft...
translation.fr: Vous pouvez prendre le commandement de l'engin,

translation.en: but if so, you will have to reveal your objectives.
translation.fr: mais vous devrez révéler vos objectifs.

translation.en: Attend to the mayday.
Command, craft is registered as Norwegian.
The Vesta IX, orbiting asteroid Toro...
translation.fr: C'est Vesta IX, en orbite autour de Toro,

translation.en: registered for biomedical research...
translation.fr: labo de recherche biomédicale sur la comète 17-P/Holmes.

translation.en: - on Comet 17- P, Holmes. - Copy.
translation.fr: labo de recherche biomédicale sur la comète 17-P/Holmes. Reçu.

translation.en: Vesta IX, we're responding to your distress call.
translation.fr: Vesta IX, nous répondons à votre appel de détresse.

translation.en: Do you read?
The distress call is fairly recent.
Maybe they were hit by The Surge.
Command, possible forced entry to the Vesta required.
translation.fr: PC, entrée de force à envisager.

translation.en: Either First Lieutenant Stanford or I will take a little spacewalk... and make our way to the craft, over.  Yes, sir.
translation.fr: Le lieutenant Stanford ou moi, on va sortir jusqu'à l'engin.

translation.en: Donald, what are you thinking?
Wanna go out there?
Uh, yeah. Doesn't matter to me.
He's scared.
Yeah, I know, my suit smells like a locker room, too. Oh, hell, I could use a good stretch anyway.
translation.fr: Ma combinaison aussi sent le fauve. Je me dégourdirais bien les jambes.

translation.en: Most of us spend our entire lives in hiding.
translation.fr: Nous passons presque tous notre vie à nous cacher.

translation.en: I'll accompany you, Captain.
Very good.
Vesta lists 26 souls onboard.
Craft registered for biomedical and animal research.
translation.fr: C'est un laboratoire de recherche biomédicale et animale.

translation.en: back there, Major.
translation.fr: Désolé pour la prise de bec.

translation.en: I'm honored to be out here with ya.
translation.fr: C'est un honneur d'être avec vous.

translation.en: You know, your dad is the reason why a lot of us are doing what we're doing.
translation.fr: Votre père a été un modèle pour beaucoup d'entre nous.

translation.en: He went farther than anybody.
translation.fr: Il est allé plus loin que quiconque.

translation.en: He was the best of us.
Imagine the things he saw.
translation.fr: Imaginez ce qu'il a dû voir.

translation.en: Imagine.

translation.fr: Vesta, le Cepheus à votre rescousse. Vous me recevez ?

translation.en: Cepheus, the craft is not responding.
Forced entry required.
I am now initiating mayday entry code.
translation.fr: Je compose le code d'accès d'urgence.

translation.en: Vesta, this is Cepheus responding to your mayday. Do you read?
translation.fr: Vesta, le Cepheus à votre rescousse. Vous me recevez ?

translation.en: Major, I'll take Truss 5. Why don't you start with Truss 2?
translation.fr: Major, je prends le segment 5. Si vous preniez le 2 ?

translation.en: Don't wander off too far, now.
Where is everybody?
Vesta, this is Cepheus responding to your mayday. Do you read?
translation.fr: Vesta, le Cepheus à votre rescousse. Vous me recevez ?

translation.en: Tanner, McBride, check.
Tanner, do you copy?
Tanner, do you copy?
Tanner?
Repeat, calling for Major McBride. Calling for Captain Tanner.
translation.fr: Appel au major McBride, appel au commandant Tanner.

translation.en: Stay calm. I got you.
Make it back.
Cepheus, Captain was attacked by a research primate.
translation.fr: Attaque par un singe de laboratoire.

translation.en: Emergency medical stand by.
Attempting extraction now.
Cepheus, this is SPACECOM. Real sorry about that setback.
translation.fr: Ici SpaceCom. Désolés pour ce contretemps.

translation.en: First Lieutenant Stanford is in command of the craft... until Captain Tanner can resume his duties. Over.
translation.fr: Le lieutenant Stanford assurera l'intérim du commandant Tanner.

translation.en: SPACECOM, this is First Lieutenant Stanford.
Captain Tanner is dead.
We take comfort knowing that the Captain embraced the rewards...
translation.fr: Nous nous consolons en pensant que le commandant a profité...

translation.en: May the angels and the saints come to meet you, as you go forth from this life.
translation.fr: Que les anges et les saints t'accueillent.

translation.en: May you meet your Redeemer face to face,
and enjoy the vision of God forever.
Are you ready for your psychological evaluation?
translation.fr: Êtes-vous prêt pour votre évaluation psychologique ?

translation.en: Yes.
Please begin.
I am on my way to Mars.
translation.fr: Je suis en route pour Mars.

translation.en: We answered a mayday call, and... ended in tragedy.
translation.fr: On a répondu à un Mayday et ça a fini en drame.

translation.en: We lost the Captain.
Your answer is being processed. Please continue.
translation.fr: Votre réponse est en cours d'analyse. Continuez.

translation.en: Well, that's it. I mean, we...
We go to work, we do our jobs...
translation.fr: On travaille, on fait ce qu'il faut...

translation.en: and then it's over.
We're here, and then we're gone.
translation.fr: On est là et puis, on est plus là.

translation.en: Please describe how the incident itself affected you.
translation.fr: Décrivez comment l'incident vous a affecté.

translation.en: The attack...
it was full of rage.
I understand that rage.
I've seen that rage in my father...
translation.fr: Je l'ai vue chez mon père

translation.en: and I've seen that rage in me.
translation.fr: et je l'ai vue chez moi.

translation.en: Because I'm angry...
that he took off.
He left us.
You know...
but when I look at that anger, if I push it aside and just put it away...
translation.fr: quand j'observe cette colère et que je la mets de côté,

translation.en: all I see is hurt.
translation.fr: je ne vois plus que... la douleur.

translation.en: I just see pain.
translation.fr: Je ne vois que... la souffrance.

translation.en: I think it keeps me walled off...
walled off from relationships... and opening myself up and,
translation.fr: ça m'empêche de construire un couple, de m'ouvrir aux autres

translation.en: you know, really caring for someone.
And I don't know how to get past that.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas comment dépasser ça.

translation.en: I don't know how to get around that.
And it worries me.
And I don't wanna be that guy.
translation.fr: ce n'est pas qui je veux être.

translation.en: I don't wanna be my dad.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas être mon père.

translation.en: Your psychological evaluation has been approved.
If you wish to obtain a complete...
Major, would you commence auto- landing sequence?
Copy.
SPACECOM, we're approaching Mars. Ersa Station, south. Over.
translation.fr: SpaceCom, on approche de Mars, Station Ersa, sud.

Is that another surge?
I think we just lost primary electrical bus.

translation.en: Switching to bus Charlie.

translation.en: Warning. Incorrect angle of descent.
Go to manual.
Warning. Incorrect angle of descent.
- Warning. - Go to manual.
Incorrect angle of descent.
Captain, you need to do something.
- I think I'm, uh...
- Go to manual. - Danger.
- Danger. - Initiating manual override.
Item 3- 2...
On my mark, execute.
Mark. I have command of the ship.
Danger.
Danger.
2,000 meters.
1,000 meters.
Warning. Incorrect angle of descent.
Four...
three...
two...
one.
Engine shut down.
Engine saved. Your ship, Captain.
Major, would you, uh, start post- landing sequence, please?
translation.fr: Major, voulez-vous lancer la séquence post-atterrissage ?

translation.en: Copy that.
Captain, I believe you understand why I did that.
I will not report it to SPACECOM.
translation.fr: Je ne le signalerai pas à SpaceCom.

translation.en: This is an emergency alert.
We have experienced an external power surge.
translation.fr: Nous avons subi une surtension externe.

translation.en: However, all underground systems remain fully operational.
translation.fr: Mais les systèmes souterrains restent opérationnels.

translation.en: And there is no reason for panic.
My destination.
Seven weeks since Earth, since air, since sun.
translation.fr: Sept semaines que j'ai quitté la Terre, l'air, le soleil.

translation.en: Welcome to Ersa Research Station. - Trees and birds. - I'm glad you made it.
Thank you. I need your logs please. Thank you.
Sir?
Thank God we're underground, but the next one could be the big one.
translation.fr: Même si on est sous terre, on craint la prochaine.

translation.en: I mean, it has been crazy around here.
This was my dad's last known stop.
translation.fr: C'est la dernière étape connue de mon père.

translation.en: Sir, you can step over here.
Put your palm down there.
Very good. Thank you.
All right, you guys are good to move to the next concourse.
The Director will meet you.
Thank you.
Welcome to the red planet, Major.
I'm Helen Lantos, Director of Operations here.
Nice to see a new face for a change.
Follow me.
You should be glad you arrived safely.
We had some kind of cosmic storm. We lost three astronauts trying to land.
translation.fr: Une tempête cosmique nous a fait perdre trois astronautes.

translation.en: No one knows what's causing them.
- Major? - Yes?
We're glad you made it.
translation.fr: On est soulagés de vous voir.

translation.en: Thanks, Helen, we can take it from here.
You're not authorized at this level.
translation.fr: Vous n'êtes pas habilitée à ce niveau.

translation.en: Well, thank you.
Stand by for secure laser transmission.
translation.fr: En attente d'une transmission laser sécurisée.

translation.en: Attempting top secret link.
translation.fr: En attente d'une transmission laser sécurisée. Tentative de connexion. Destination : Neptune.

translation.en: Range: Neptune.
This is Major Roy McBride.
I'm communicating through a secure laser transmission...
translation.fr: Ceci est une liaison laser sécurisée

translation.en: sent from the communications hub
on Ersa Base, North America sector, Mars.
translation.fr: transmise depuis la base Ersa, secteur nord-américain, Mars.

translation.en: I'm attempting to reach Doctor Clifford McBride.
translation.fr: Je cherche à joindre le docteur Clifford McBride.

translation.en: This is Doctor McBride's son, Roy.
translation.fr: Je suis le fils du docteur McBride, Roy.

translation.en: Father, if you can hear me...
I'm attempting to communicate with you.
translation.fr: j'essaie d'entrer en contact avec toi.

translation.en: SPACECOM wants you to know that they are aware of the disturbances...
translation.fr: SpaceCom t'assure qu'ils ont connaissance des anomalies

translation.en: and that it cannot be your responsibility.
translation.fr: et qu'elles ne sont pas de ton fait.

translation.en: They would like all information...
translation.fr: Ils voudraient être informés des mesures

translation.en: about attempts that you are making
translation.fr: Ils voudraient être informés des mesures que tu prends pour améliorer la situation.

translation.en: to ameliorate the situation.
translation.fr: que tu prends pour améliorer la situation.

translation.en: They would also like to tell you... they're willing to help and provide
translation.fr: Ils sont prêts à t'apporter leur aide

translation.en: for a rescue mission if possible.
translation.fr: et à organiser une mission de sauvetage si c'est possible.

translation.en: I hope you receive this message.
translation.fr: J'espère que tu auras ce message.

translation.en: Over and out.
Transmission sent. Awaiting response.
translation.fr: Message envoyé. En attente d'une réponse.

translation.en: Roy, we'll try again next cycle.
translation.fr: Roy, on retentera à la prochaine rotation.

translation.en: They're using me.
Goddamn them.
I don't know if I hope to find him...
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas si j'espère le retrouver

translation.en: or finally be free of him.
translation.fr: ou enfin me libérer de lui.

translation.en: Dad...
Dad, I'd like to see you again.
I recall how we used to watch black and white movies together...
translation.fr: Je me souviens, on regardait des films en noir et blanc.

translation.en: and musicals were your favorite.
translation.fr: Je me souviens, on regardait des films en noir et blanc. Tu adorais les comédies musicales.

translation.en: I remember you tutoring me in math.
translation.fr: Tu me faisais travailler mes maths.

translation.en: You instilled in me a strong work ethic.
translation.fr: Tu m'as inculqué la valeur du travail.

translation.en: Work hard, play later, as you said.
translation.fr: Travaille dur, amuse-toi plus tard, comme tu disais.

translation.en: You should know I've chosen a career that you would approve of.
translation.fr: Sache que j'ai choisi un métier que tu approuverais.

translation.en: I've dedicated my life to the exploration of space.
translation.fr: Je consacre ma vie à l'exploration spatiale.

translation.en: And I thank you for that.
So, I hope we can reconnect.
Your loving son, Roy.
Transmission sent,
awaiting response.
Thank you so much, Major, for all your help.
translation.fr: Merci beaucoup pour votre aide, major.

translation.en: We'll be returning you to the Earth in short order. Thank you.
translation.fr: On vous renvoie sur Terre dans les plus brefs délais.

translation.en: Excuse me. Did you get a response from my father?
Major, your personal connection
translation.fr: Major, vos liens de parenté vous disqualifient

translation.en: has made you unsuited...
translation.fr: vos liens de parenté vous disqualifient

translation.en: for continued service on this mission.
translation.fr: pour la suite de la mission.

translation.en: He answered me, didn't he?
Major, we will let you know any details as soon as possible.
translation.fr: Vous serez informé des détails dès que possible.

translation.en: Roy.
Your pulse is very fast.
I know!
There's also some issues with your biorhythms.
Those will need to be addressed before you can safely return to Earth.
translation.fr: Il faut régler ça avant que vous rentriez sur Terre.

translation.en: Would you please follow that man
to take a psychological evaluation?
Captain.
McBride, Roy R. Are you ready
for your psychological evaluation?
translation.fr: êtes-vous prêt pour votre évaluation psychologique ?

translation.en: How are you feeling in your current state?
Good, thank you.
I will be returning to Earth soon.
I'm content to go home, and...
translation.fr: Je suis heureux de rentrer et...

translation.en: You have failed your psychological evaluation.
You will be returned to a comfort room
translation.fr: Vous irez en salon de détente

translation.en: until you are deemed...
Contact U.S. SPACECOM.
Provide contact and priority code.
Request emergency communication with General Stroud.
translation.fr: Appel urgent pour le général Stroud.

translation.en: Priority code, Zulu- 5- 5- Bravo- Papa.
Your priority code is no longer valid.
Please contact a representative if this restriction is an error.
translation.fr: Veuillez contacter un représentant s'il s'agit d'une erreur.

translation.en: You're going back to Earth now?
Can I help you?
I've only been there once.
translation.fr: Je n'y suis allée qu'une fois,

translation.en: As a child.
I was born here.
But I remember it so well.
It was... beautiful.
Ma'am, I'd really appreciate my privacy right now.
You're here because of the cosmic rays, aren't you?
translation.fr: Vous êtes ici à cause des rayons cosmiques, non ?

translation.en: That's classified.
The craft you came in, the Cepheus...
they want me to requisition it for deep space...
translation.fr: je dois le réquisitionner pour envoi dans l'espace lointain.

translation.en: with nuclear munitions onboard. Did you know that?
translation.fr: Équipé d'armes nucléaires. Vous le saviez ?

translation.en: It's for a search and destroy mission.
I am responsible for more than 1,100 people here.
translation.fr: Je suis responsable de plus de 1 100 personnes, ici,

translation.en: On this base.
Now, I need to know.
Are we gonna die?
I don't know what happens now.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas ce qui va se passer.

translation.en: I know who you are.
You are Clifford McBride's son.
Well, then we're both victims of the Lima Project.
translation.fr: Alors, on est tous deux victimes du Projet Lima.

translation.en: My parents left for that expedition.
translation.fr: Mes parents faisaient partie de cette expédition.

translation.en: You and I share a great loss, Roy.
translation.fr: Nous avons tous deux vécu un grand deuil.

translation.en: Please, just tell me.
The Cepheus leaves in five hours.
translation.fr: Le Cepheus part dans cinq heures.

translation.en: You were right.
The Surge is coming from the Lima Project.
translation.fr: La Surcharge provient du Projet Lima.

translation.en: Ultimate catastrophe is very possible.
translation.fr: La catastrophe absolue est très possible.

translation.en: SPACECOM has determined that I am unfit to carry on.
translation.fr: SpaceCom a décidé que je n'étais pas à même de continuer.

translation.en: That's all I know.
I believe your father is alive.
translation.fr: Pour moi, votre père est en vie.

translation.en: They never told you what happened to him out there, did they?
translation.fr: Ils ne vous ont jamais dit ce qui lui était arrivé, hein ?

translation.en: U.S. Space Command
Top Secret Briefing. Alpha- Papa- 4- 2- 7- 8.
Communications has received the following mayday call... from the crew of the Lima Project,
translation.fr: On a reçu le Mayday suivant de l'équipage du Projet Lima

translation.en: under the command of H. Clifford McBride.
translation.fr: sous le commandement de H. Clifford McBride.

translation.en: This is Clifford McBride, reporting from the Lima Project.
translation.fr: Ici Clifford McBride, au rapport depuis le Projet Lima.

translation.en: I'm disclosing a tragedy.
translation.fr: Je dois déclarer la survenue d'un drame.

translation.en: Here, on the edge of our solar system,
translation.fr: Ici, aux confins du système solaire,

translation.en: some of our people... have been unable to handle the psychological distress...
translation.fr: certains n'ont pas réussi à gérer la pression psychologique

translation.en: of being so far away from home.
translation.fr: certains n'ont pas réussi à gérer la pression psychologique causée par l'éloignement.

translation.en: They desired to return to Earth,
translation.fr: Ils ont voulu rentrer sur Terre,

translation.en: and I could not permit that.
translation.fr: ce que je ne pouvais accepter.

translation.en: And I have to report the reality
translation.fr: La réalité, c'est qu'ils se sont mutinés,

translation.en: that they mutinied...
translation.fr: La réalité, c'est qu'ils se sont mutinés, ils ont commis des actes de sabotage,

translation.en: committed acts of sabotage trying to commandeer my ship.
translation.fr: ils ont commis des actes de sabotage, aux fins de réquisitionner mon vaisseau.

translation.en: I was forced to react with equal severity.
translation.fr: J'ai été obligé de réagir avec sévérité.

translation.en: I disabled one section
of our station's life support system...
and without doubt,
translation.fr: et nul doute que j'ai puni des innocents

translation.en: I did punish the innocent along with the guilty.
translation.fr: et nul doute que j'ai puni des innocents en même temps que les coupables.

translation.en: We will not turn back.
We will venture further into space.
translation.fr: Nous nous enfoncerons plus loin dans l'espace.

translation.en: We will find alien intelligence.
I am forever driven on this quest.
translation.fr: Je suis à jamais dédié à cette quête.

translation.en: SPACECOM would never allow
translation.fr: Pour SpaceCom, une image ternie est inenvisageable.

translation.en: their image to be shattered...
so they made him a hero to protect themselves.
translation.fr: Ils ont fait de lui un héros pour se protéger.

translation.en: Your father murdered my parents.
translation.fr: Votre père a assassiné mes parents.

translation.en: That monster threatens us all.
translation.fr: Ce monstre est une menace pour nous tous.

translation.en: And now it's your burden.
Can you get me on that ship?
translation.fr: Vous pouvez me faire monter à bord ?

translation.en: I can get you to the rocket.
translation.fr: Je vous conduirai à la fusée.

translation.en: After that, you're on your own.
translation.fr: Après cela, vous devrez vous débrouiller.

translation.en: I will deal with him.
I will deal with my father.
translation.fr: Je me chargerai de mon père.

translation.en: This is a map of an underground lake beneath the launchpad.
translation.fr: Voici la carte d'un lac sous le pas de tir.

translation.en: You'll be able to access the ship from there.
translation.fr: Vous accéderez au vaisseau à partir de là.

translation.en: We're approaching.
They're gonna come for you, you know.
I know.
I don't care anymore.
I need to get back now, do what I can.
translation.fr: Je dois rentrer, maintenant, faire ce que je peux.

translation.en: Good luck.
I'm being pulled,
farther and farther from the sun...
translation.fr: de plus en plus loin du soleil.

translation.en: to you.
You're alive.
All this time.
I must accept the fact I never really knew you.
translation.fr: Je dois accepter le fait que je ne te connaissais pas.

translation.en: Or am I you...
being pulled down the same dark hole?
translation.fr: Attiré dans le même trou sombre ?

translation.en: This is Cepheus Launch Control... at T- minus 11 minutes, 7 seconds and counting.
translation.fr: Ici Contrôle Lancement du Cepheus à H-11 minutes, 7 secondes.

translation.en: Our countdown continuing and still aiming
translation.fr: Le compte à rebours vise toujours

translation.en: toward a planned lift- off time...
translation.fr: Le compte à rebours vise toujours l'heure de décollage

translation.en: at 7:51, UTC.
translation.fr: l'heure de décollage prévue à 7 h 51 UTC.

translation.en: This is Launch Control. Launch is imminent.
Final checks from the flight azimuth going on at this time...
translation.fr: Vérifications en cours pour l'azimut de vol.

translation.en: and we're also synchronizing the clocks
to the spacecraft... with the Mission Control Center in Ersa.
translation.fr: entre le vaisseau et le centre de contrôle d'Ersa.

translation.en: The engines are armed.
Ten, nine...
We have commit.
...two, one.
Lift- off. We have lift- off. 7:51, UTC.
There's a breach.
It's the airlock breach.
SPACECOM, this is Cepheus. There's been a breach in our airlock.
translation.fr: SpaceCom, ici le Cepheus. Notre sas est ouvert.

translation.en: How to proceed? Over.
We see that, too. We're checking it out. Stand by.
translation.fr: On a vu, on vérifie. Patientez.

translation.en: SPACECOM, we need orders, please. Over.
translation.fr: SpaceCom, on attend les ordres. À vous.

translation.en: McBride for Captain Stanford...
Do you read?
Jesus, it's McBride.
He's breached the goddamn airlock.
translation.fr: Il a forcé le sas, bon Dieu !

translation.en: Captain Stanford, this is Major McBride. I am onboard.
translation.fr: Commandant Stanford, ici McBride, je suis à bord.

translation.en: I am not a threat. I repeat, I am not a threat.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas une menace.

translation.en: Major, your presence is jeopardizing the mission. Stay where you are!
translation.fr: Votre présence compromet la mission. Ne bougez pas.

translation.en: Do not proceed any further.
- SPACECOM... - Stand by.
SPACECOM, what are your orders?
We're determining the course of action here.  We're about to switch
translation.fr: On va passer en propulsion longue distance.

translation.en: over to long- range propulsion.
translation.fr: On va passer en propulsion longue distance. Vous n'atteindrez pas Neptune, vous avez besoin de moi.

translation.en: Can you neutralize the threat? You'll never make it to Neptune without me.
translation.fr: Vous n'atteindrez pas Neptune, vous avez besoin de moi.

translation.en: You need me.  Neutralize the Major. By any means necessary, you must neutralize the Major.
translation.fr: Neutralisez le major. Par tous moyens.

translation.en: Copy that.
Don't listen to them, Captain.
I will take all accountability.
Major, stay where you are.
Do not proceed any further. Do you read? Over.
translation.fr: N'allez pas plus loin. Vous avez compris ?

translation.en: I say again, neutralize the Major...
translation.fr: Je répète, neutralisez le major par tous moyens.

translation.en: - by any means necessary. - Yoshida, I am not a threat.
translation.fr: Je répète, neutralisez le major par tous moyens. Je ne suis pas une menace. Ni votre ennemi.

translation.en: I am not the enemy.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas une menace. Ni votre ennemi.

translation.en: I am on your side.
Major, we have our orders.
Goddamn it! We're staging!
translation.fr: Major, on a des ordres. Largage en cours !

translation.en: Frank, get out of there! Deavers!
- Get back in your seat! - Deavers, please!
Son of a bitch!
Air contaminated.
Get oxygen!
Yoshida, oxygen!
Ventilator. Ventilator.
Breathe in!
What have I done?
Mission, this is Major Roy McBride.
I boarded the Cepheus against mission directives.
translation.fr: J'ai embarqué sur le Cepheus en enfreignant les consignes.

translation.en: I did not do so with hostile intent.
But because of my actions, I regret to inform you...
translation.fr: Mais de mon fait, malheureusement, je dois vous informer

translation.en: all crew members are now deceased.
The flight recorder will tell the story.
translation.fr: L'enregistreur de vol donnera les faits.

translation.en: History will have to decide.
I'm en route to Neptune.
I remain fully committed...
to the completion of the mission...
translation.fr: pour mener la mission à bien,

translation.en: namely to destroy
the Lima Project in its entirety.
translation.fr: du Projet Lima dans sa totalité.

translation.en: I'm switching off all comms.
I'm going dark until final approach to avoid detection.
translation.fr: Silence radio jusqu'à l'approche pour rester furtif.

translation.en: Over and out.
Estimated length of journey...
translation.fr: Durée estimée du trajet : 79 jours, quatre heures,

translation.en: 79 days, four hours, eight minutes.
translation.fr: Durée estimée du trajet : 79 jours, quatre heures, huit minutes.

translation.en: You seem really preoccupied with your work.
translation.fr: Tu sembles préoccupé par ton travail.

translation.en: I just feel like I'm on my own all the time.
I don't know what we're doing.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas ce qu'on fait.

translation.en: You're so distant.
I mean, even when you're here, I don't know where you are.
translation.fr: Même quand tu es là, je ne sais pas où tu es.

translation.en: I feel like I'm looking for you all the time...
translation.fr: C'est comme si je te cherchais tout le temps,

translation.en: trying to connect to you, be close to you...
translation.fr: pour communiquer, me rapprocher de toi.

translation.en: and it fucking sucks.
You know, I have my own life.
I'm my own person.
And I can't just wait for you.
translation.fr: J'ai mieux à faire que t'attendre.

translation.en: Feeding tube activated.
...we have excited real and enormous interest... around the world, and we're grateful for it.
translation.fr: ... nous avons suscité un vif intérêt

translation.en: See, we're doing big things up here. Real big.
translation.fr: et c'est un honneur. On fait de grandes choses.

translation.en: Namely, we are about to answer the number one question...
translation.fr: On fait de grandes choses. On va répondre à la grande question :

translation.en: when do we find
translation.fr: On va répondre à la grande question : à quand la découverte de formes de vies intelligentes ?

translation.en: all the intelligent life out there? And we know we will,
translation.fr: à quand la découverte de formes de vies intelligentes ?

translation.en: What you see here
is the new starshade, just ready to deploy.
You see it opening up
just like a prairie flower in the springtime.
translation.fr: comme une fleur des champs. Mais tu es devenu indigne,

translation.en: But I think you are no longer deserving...
so I guess...
this is goodbye.
...retired from the program leaves me to doubt
translation.fr: Ton retrait du programme confirme ton manque de jugement

translation.en: not only your judgement, but your character.
translation.fr: Ton retrait du programme confirme ton manque de jugement et de caractère.

translation.en: See, we're just out from Mars now.  He's been to Mars?
Just on our way past Jupiter...
Do you wanna know a secret?
translation.fr: On passe Jupiter pour enfin atteindre Neptune.

translation.en: ...eventually onto Neptune.
You have traded...
♪ B, you're so beautiful ♪  ...a glimpse of the infinite...
♪ D, you're delightful and E, you're exciting and ♪  I am free of your moral boundaries.
translation.fr: Je suis au-delà de tes dilemmes.

translation.en: I have total clarity.  ♪ F, you're a feather in my arms ♪
I am on my way to Neptune...
The zero G and the extended duration of the journey is affecting me...
translation.fr: La gravité et la longueur du voyage m'affectent,

translation.en: both physically and mentally.
I am alone.
Something I always believed I preferred.
But I confess...
it's wearing on me.
I am alone. I am alone.
Over and out.
I've let so many people down.
translation.fr: J'ai laissé tomber tant de gens.

translation.en: Hi, Roy.
I know it's a little bit weird...
that I'm sending you this video, and not talking to you in person...
translation.fr: de t'envoyer une vidéo au lieu de te parler.

translation.en: I'm so selfish. I'm selfish. I'm just so selfish.
I'm just a selfish person.
translation.fr: Égoïste, je ne suis qu'un égoïste.

translation.en: And I know for certain I am doing God's work. Forgiveness is bullshit.
translation.fr: Je suis sûr de faire œuvre divine.

translation.en: We will find our brothers and sisters...
Exaltation!
Approaching location determined by McBride, Roy R.
translation.fr: En approche de la destination déterminée par McBride, Roy R.

translation.en: Retrieved, Mars secure laser transmission.
translation.fr: Récupération message laser sécurisé de Mars.

translation.en: - - Entering Neptune signal zone.
translation.fr: Entrée dans la zone de signal de Neptune.

translation.en: Execute 72 plus 99.
Executed.
Nuclear activation code
accessible through system file 52B.
translation.fr: Code d'activation nucléaire accessible par le dossier système 52B.

translation.en: Flight recorder,
the Lima Project's orbit is degrading.
translation.fr: l'orbite du Projet Lima se dégrade.

translation.en: Its position has shifted somewhat from the programmed coordinates.
translation.fr: Sa position a un peu dévié des coordonnées programmées.

translation.en: I will need to take a transport capsule
to maneuver around Neptune's rings.
translation.fr: pour naviguer autour des anneaux de Neptune.

translation.en: The Cepheus will remain in autopilot
translation.fr: Le Cepheus restera en pilote automatique

translation.en: while I complete the mission.
translation.fr: le temps que j'achève la mission.

translation.en: All my life, I was terrified to confront him.
translation.fr: Toute ma vie, j'ai été terrifié de l'affronter.

translation.en: I'm terrified even now.
What do I expect?
In the end, the son suffers the sins of the father.
translation.fr: À la fin, le fils pâtit des péchés du père.

translation.en: Warning. Power surge. CPU damaged.
Warning. Power surge.
Lima, Major McBride of the Cepheus.
translation.fr: Lima, ici le major McBride du Cepheus.

translation.en: United States Armed Forces, Space Division.
Attempting to contact Dr. Clifford McBride. Over.
translation.fr: Je cherche à contacter le docteur Clifford McBride. À vous.

translation.en: Lima, Cepheus. Do you read? Over.
translation.fr: Lima, ici le Cepheus. Vous me recevez ?

translation.en: Craft damaged. Unable to dock.
- Roy? -
Roy, is that you?
I have cataracts, I don't see very well.
translation.fr: Avec ma cataracte, je vois mal.

translation.en: Hi, Dad.
You alone?
Oh, yeah.
Captain always goes down with the ship.
translation.fr: Le capitaine coule toujours avec son navire.

translation.en: I've been here quite a while alone.
translation.fr: Je suis seul depuis un bon moment.

translation.en: I'm trying to stop this goddamn surge.
What happened?
My last loyal few tried to escape.
translation.fr: Mes derniers fidèles ont essayé de s'échapper.

translation.en: And they started all this.
They caused a meltdown out there, Roy.
translation.fr: Ils ont causé une fusion incontrôlée.

translation.en: We fought, and our struggle caused catastrophe.
translation.fr: On s'est battus, notre lutte a mené à la catastrophe.

translation.en: It's why I'm here. I'm gonna stop it.
translation.fr: Je suis là pour mettre fin à tout ça.

translation.en: Get the two of us back home, maybe.
Home?
Yep.
This is home.
This is a one- way voyage, my son.
translation.fr: C'est un aller simple, mon fils.

translation.en: You're talking about Earth?
translation.fr: Tu me parles de la Terre ?

translation.en: There was never anything for me there.
I never cared about you, or your mother...
translation.fr: Je ne me suis jamais soucié de toi, de ta mère

translation.en: or any of your small ideas.
translation.fr: Je ne me suis jamais soucié de toi, de ta mère ou de vos idées étriquées.

translation.en: For 30 years...
I've been breathing this air, eating this food...
translation.fr: je respire cet air, mange cette nourriture,

translation.en: enduring these hardships...
and I never once thought about home.
translation.fr: Et jamais je n'ai pensé à la maison.

translation.en: I know, Dad.
I knew this would widow your mother...
translation.fr: Je savais que ça ferait de ta mère une veuve

translation.en: and orphan you...
but I found my destiny.
So, I abandoned my son.
I still love you, Dad.
I'm taking you back.
Hmm... I have work to do.
I have infinite work to do.
I must find intelligent life.
translation.fr: Je dois trouver des vies intelligentes.

translation.en: It's time to go.
We don't have much time.
Come on.
I admire your courage for coming alone, Roy...
translation.fr: Je t'admire d'avoir eu le courage de venir seul,

translation.en: traveling all this way...
following me here.
Makes me wonder what we could have accomplished together.
But I guess...
translation.fr: Mais je suppose que le destin

translation.en: the fates have deprived me
translation.fr: Mais je suppose que le destin m'a privé de l'associé que j'aurais dû avoir.

translation.en: of the partner I should have had.
translation.fr: m'a privé de l'associé que j'aurais dû avoir.

translation.en: If we'd had more people like you...
translation.fr: Avec plus de gens comme toi,

translation.en: we could have pressed on, could've found what we're looking for.
translation.fr: on aurait pu avancer et trouver ce qu'on cherche.

translation.en: My crew examined all the data...
translation.fr: Mon équipe a analysé les données,

translation.en: discovered no other life out there.
translation.fr: ils n'ont trouvé aucune autre forme de vie.

translation.en: No other consciousness.
They quit.
Sometimes...
the human will must overcome the impossible.
translation.fr: la volonté humaine doit vaincre l'impossible.

translation.en: You and I have to continue on, Roy. Together.
translation.fr: Toi et moi, on doit continuer. Ensemble.

translation.en: To find what science claims does not exist.
translation.fr: Pour trouver ce que la science persiste à nier.

translation.en: You and I, together, Roy.
Because the Lima Project has told us...
translation.fr: Parce que le Projet Lima nous a dit

translation.en: that we're all alone in the knowable universe.
translation.fr: que nous sommes seuls dans l'univers connaissable.

translation.en: I can't fail.
You can't let me fail, Roy.
Dad...
you haven't.
Now, we know...
we're all we've got.
Armed. T- minus three hours.
Dad! Stop!
Roy!
Let me go.
Let me go, Roy.
Roy, let me go.
Let me go, Roy.
Dad!
Let me go, Roy.
Unhook me.
Unhook me, son.
Why go on?
Why keep trying?
You're gathering my work, I see.
translation.fr: Tu récupères mes travaux, je vois.

translation.en: Data download initiated.
We're a dying breed, Roy.
translation.fr: On est une espèce en extinction.

translation.en: He captured strange and distant worlds in greater detail than ever before.
translation.fr: Il a saisi des mondes étranges avec une précision inégalée.

translation.en: They were beautiful, magnificent...
translation.fr: Des mondes d'une beauté, d'une majesté

translation.en: full of awe and wonder.
But beneath their sublime surfaces...
there was nothing.
No love or hate.
No light or dark.
He could only see what was not there...
translation.fr: Il ne voyait que ce qui n'était pas,

translation.en: and missed what was right in front of him.
translation.fr: sans considérer ce qui était devant lui.

translation.en: Command, this is Major Roy McBride.
I made it to the Lima Project.
translation.fr: J'ai pu atteindre le Projet Lima.

translation.en: I am destroying the structure...
translation.fr: Je détruis la structure pour empêcher d'autres surtensions

translation.en: to prevent any further surges from reaching Earth...
translation.fr: Je détruis la structure pour empêcher d'autres surtensions de toucher la Terre

translation.en: using the nuclear munitions onboard.
translation.fr: en me servant des armes nucléaires à bord.

translation.en: I will attempt to return
translation.fr: J'essaierai de revenir en utilisant l'explosion

translation.en: using the explosion as my primary propellant.
translation.fr: J'essaierai de revenir en utilisant l'explosion comme moyen de propulsion.

translation.en: In the case I do not survive,
I've retrieved significant data from the Lima.
translation.fr: j'ai rapporté des données provenant du Lima.

translation.en: And all efforts should be made to retrieve my craft.
Trajectory, Earth.
2.714 billion miles.
I am looking forward to the day my solitude ends.
translation.fr: J'attends avec impatience le jour où ma solitude prendra fin.

translation.en: And I'm home.
Detonation in T- minus 20 seconds.
The aboard advisory system.  Affirmative, we're ready.
translation.fr: - On coupe le contrôle de navigation. - Prêts.

translation.en: USP flight system is operational. Thank you.
K- R- 5 on the 4- 2.
Good copy, flight. We're ready to go.
I'm steady, calm.
I slept well. No bad dreams.
translation.fr: J'ai bien dormi, pas de cauchemars.

translation.en: I am active and engaged.
I'm aware of my surroundings and those in my immediate sphere.
translation.fr: J'ai conscience de mon environnement et des gens qui m'entourent.

translation.en: I'm attentive.
I'm focused on the essential...
to the exclusion of all else.
I'm unsure of the future...
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas sûr de ce que sera l'avenir.

translation.en: but I'm not concerned.
I will rely on those closest to me.
And I will share their burdens...
as they share mine.
I will live...
and love.
Submit.
